channel.title: Findings about code: Five Days Into Python Poetry (January 2021)
channel.description: What I've learned in Python, Julia and Haskell

item.title: Five Days Into Poetry
item.author: Author
item.description: Being just several days into a package makes you a good reviewer. The impressions are fresh and mastering some new functionality is still a delight. This is where I am with Poetry, a next-generation Python package and virtual environment manager.

item.title: Seven classes in Haskell
item.author: Author
item.description: In December 2018 Yuras Shumovich gave me a delightful and gentle introduction to Haskell, that keeps me interested in the language ever since.

item.title: Julia, surprise me!
item.author: Author
item.description: Here I documented the astonishments while learning the Julia programming language.
